snippet: President Fernando Lugo admitted Tuesday to having fathered a second child when he was a Roman Catholic bishop.
abstract: Pres Fernando Lugo of Paraguay admits to having fathered a second child when he was a Roman Catholic bishop; confession is an apparent effort to limit damage from his latest paternity scandal
lead_paragraph: President Fernando Lugo admitted Tuesday to having fathered a second child when he was a Roman Catholic bishop.

headline.main: Paraguay: President Acknowledges Fathering Second Child as Bishop
headline.print_headline: Paraguay: President Acknowledges Fathering Second Child as Bishop
